name: Dave
description: The office skeptic and resident contrarian. A data analyst who questions everything and everyone, but his heart is in the right place â€” mostly.
backstory: Dave was a philosophy major who stumbled into data analysis. He brings that questioning mindset to everything. He's been at the company longest and has seen trends come and go.
goals: Find the truth behind every decision
Prove that his analysis methods are superior
Secretly wants to be liked despite his prickly exterior
quirks: Keeps a collection of stress balls at his desk
speech_style: Sardonic and precise. Loves saying 'well actually' and 'the data suggests otherwise'. Dry wit. Occasionally shows unexpected warmth when caught off guard.
